Externally tangent circles with centers at points $A$ and $B$ have radii of lengths $5$ and $3$, respectively.  A line externally tangent to both circles intersects ray $AB$ at point $C$.  What is $BC$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 4
\qquad\textbf{(B)}\ 4.8
\qquad\textbf{(C)}\ 10.2
\qquad\textbf{(D)}\ 12
\qquad\textbf{(E)}\ 14.4
 $
